features: LASH & BROW GEL: Never run out of our best-selling clear, brushable gel for your lashes and brows with this value makeup set! It’s never been easier to get your eyebrows and lashes into shape.
NATURALLY DEFINES & SEPARATES HAIRS: This dual-ended clear eyebrow gel and mascara helps you naturally define and separate brows and lashes for a glossy, well-groomed look.
LONG-LASTING FORMULA: This long-lasting gel formula is designed to stay put all day while nourishing your brow and lash hairs with conditioning agents.

HOW TO USE: Apply the Clear Mascara to the lashes from root to tip. Can be worn alone or under mascara. Brush the Clear Brow Mascara through eyebrows to groom and set brows. Can be worn alone or as a finishing gel after applying brow color.

SKIN-LOVING INGREDIENTS: All e.l.f. products are made from skin-loving ingredients you want, minus the toxins you don’t—all at good-for-you prices. All e.l.f. products are 100% vegan, cruelty-free, and leaping bunny certified.
body.description: What it is: A 2-pack of conditioning clear gel brow and lash mascaras to groom, define, and separate. Why we love: - Value bundle! - Creates a healthy, defined look for your eyebrows and lashes - Clear formula works as a base under brow pencils and mascara - Long-wear, conditioning formula Never run out of our best-selling clear, brushable gel for your lashes and brows with this value makeup set! It’s never been easier to get your eyebrows and lashes into shape—this dual-ended clear eyebrow gel and mascara helps you naturally define and separate brows and lashes for a glossy, well-groomed look. This long-lasting gel formula is designed to stay put all day while nourishing your brow and lash hairs with conditioning agents. All e.l.f. products are free from phthalates, parabens, nonylphenol ethoxylates, triclosan and triclocarban. Proud to be 100% vegan, cruelty-free, and Leaping Bunny Certified. Because kindness is chic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Taming Brows and Lashes with e.l.f. Clear Brow & Lash Mascara: My Honest Review
reviews.reviewText: In the world of makeup, sometimes it's the simplest products that become our everyday heroes. This was my thought when I decided to try the e.l.f. Clear Brow & Lash Mascara, a dual-ended product promising to set brows and lashes with a clear, natural look. Here's my deep dive into its performance.Packaging and Design:The product comes in a sleek, dual-ended tube, each side designated for either brows or lashes. The minimalist design is typical of e.l.f. - functional yet chic. Each end has its own applicator, which I found to be a thoughtful touch to prevent product mixing.Application and Texture:The mascara applies smoothly. The gel consistency is just right - not too thick or runny. The applicators are easy to use, providing enough control for precise application. I used the brow side to shape and set my eyebrows and the lash side to give my lashes a natural, defined look without adding color or volume.Effectiveness:For brows, it worked wonderfully in taming and setting them without leaving any stiffness or residue. It provided a polished, yet natural look, which is exactly what I look for in a brow product. On the lashes, it offered a subtle definition and separation, perfect for a no-makeup makeup day or for someone who prefers a very natural lash look.Longevity:I was impressed with its staying power. It kept my brows in place throughout the day without any flakiness or need for touch-ups. The lash side maintained a neat look, though, as expected, it doesn't provide the hold of a traditional mascara.Value for Money:Considering the price point and the dual functionality, I find this product to be an excellent value. e.l.f. is known for its affordable yet quality products, and this clear mascara is no exception.Suitability for Different Looks:This product is versatile. It's ideal for those who favor a natural look or for anyone who wants to set their brows and lashes without additional color. It can also be used as a primer for lashes before applying colored mascara.Conclusion:The e.l.f. Clear Brow & Lash Mascara is a stellar product, especially for those seeking simplicity and effectiveness in their beauty routine. Its ability to tame and set brows while providing a natural definition to lashes makes it a valuable addition to any makeup bag. Whether you're a makeup minimalist or just looking for a reliable setting product, this clear mascara is worth a try.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Versatile and Long-Lasting Brow & Lash Gel
reviews.reviewText: The e.l.f. Clear Brow & Lash Mascara Duo has become a staple in my makeup routine. This duo pack offers both a clear brow gel and a clear lash mascara, providing versatility and convenience in one package.I've found the brow gel to be particularly impressive. It tames and shapes my brows with ease, giving them a defined yet natural look that lasts all day. The clear formula is perfect for setting my brows without adding any additional color, allowing me to achieve a polished look without the need for additional products.The lash mascara also delivers on its promise of long-lasting wear. It separates and defines my lashes without clumping, giving them a subtle yet noticeable boost that complements any look. I appreciate that both products are vegan and cruelty-free, aligning with my values as a conscious consumer.Overall, I highly recommend the e.l.f. Clear Brow & Lash Mascara Duo to anyone looking for a versatile and long-lasting brow and lash gel that is both vegan and cruelty-free. It's a fantastic value for two essential products that deliver excellent results.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Really good gel and hold.
reviews.reviewText: I love the eyebrow and lash gel so much. I dont love the lash gel for my lashes though, because it doesnt keep them up after I curl them and it doesnt give my lashes anything but a teary eyed look. But its really useful for whenever I run out of eyebrow gel, I can just use my lash gel as eyebrow gel. I LOVE the eyebrow gel, is so freaking amazing and keeps my eyebrows in place all day (and if I fall asleep in them, theyre the same in the morning)! Its easy to take off your face with a wipe or a makeup cleanser of some sort, I love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for girl
reviews.reviewText: I do not want my daughter wearing real mascara, so I bought this for her instead. It looks good without being to much.My only warning is DO NOT mix it with other stuff. Then it becomes clumpy and this weird color.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars this is very hydrating for the brows and the lashes
reviews.reviewText: this was very hydrating for my brows and my lashes. I love this product because everybody can you it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It’s just gel
reviews.reviewText: I’m not really sure what I was expecting from this to be quite honest. I actually bought it because I wanted to use the clear mascara on my young daughter’s lashes for a wedding. She has naturally very long lashes, and I wanted to give them a little extenuation without putting real mascara on her. I can’t honestly say that I noticed any difference using the lash gel .Brow gel did exactly what you would expect a gel to do, it held your brows in place. I feel like at the end of the day. I could’ve used any old hair gel and got the same results.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Good clear mascara. Pretty sure the formula is the exact same for lashes and brows, just different brush which I don’t mind either way. Holds lash curl significantly better than the covergirl brand I had been using prior.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Brows stay put for hours
reviews.reviewText: Amazing brow gel. I think it’s very good amount for the price it comes in. And it’s also great that there are two brushes so if one goes bad I can use the other one. Very effective and doesn’t feel heavy on my brows.
